from a briefing President Lyndon Johnson gave in 1966 on the Vietnam War and John McCain House papers from July 1975- when he was chief of staff under President Lyndon Johnson Gerald Ford - with passages initialed by Donald Rumsfeld 's then-assistant, Dick Cheney . It's not a journal, it's not a diary, he says of the Gerald Ford John McCain House notes. "It is a set of working documents that I've never edited. In fact, most I've never reread."
